sen.j: 進藤 長房（しんどう ながふさ、寛永19年（1642年） - 享保3年8月6日 (旧暦)（1718年8月31日））は、江戸時代前期から中期の青侍。
sen.e: Nagafusa SHINDO (1642 - August 31, 1718) was aozamurai (young samurai of lower rank) from the early to middle of the Edo period.
Nagafusa SHINDO (1642 - August 31, 1718) was aozamurai (young samurai of lower rank) from the early to middle of the Edo period.
Nagafusa SHINDO (1642 - August 31, 1718) was aozamurai (young samurai of lower rank) from the early to middle of the Edo period.
He served as Shodaibu in the Konoe family.
He served as Shodaibu (aristocracy lower than Kugyo) in the Konoe family.
sen.cmt: 諸大夫が初出のため説明を補いました。
sen.e: He served as Shodaibu (aristocracy lower than Kugyo) in the Konoe family.

sen.j: 官位は従三位筑後国守。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Chikugo no kuni no Kami.
His official court rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Chikugo no kuni no Kami (a chief of provincial governors in Chikugo).
sen.cmt: 筑後国守が初出のため、説明を補いました。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Chikugo no kuni no Kami (a chief of provincial governors in Chikugo).

sen.j: 主に近衛尚嗣（19代当主）、近衛基熙（20代当主）の2代にわたり近衛家に仕えた。
sen.e: He mostly served the Konoe family for two generations, Hisatugu KONOE (the nineteenth head of the Konoe family) and Motohiro KONOE (the twentieth head of the Konoe family).
He mostly served the Konoe family for two generations, Hisatugu KONOE (the nineteenth head of the Konoe family) and Motohiro KONOE (the twentieth head of the Konoe family).
He mostly served the Konoe family for two generations, Hisatugu KONOE (the nineteenth head of the Konoe family) and Motohiro KONOE (the twentieth head of the Konoe family).
He was a son of Nagasada SHINDO.
He was a son of Nagasada SHINDO.
He was a son of Nagasada SHINDO.

sen.j: 母は大石良勝（大石良雄の曾祖父）の娘。
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of Yoshikatsu OISHI (a great grandfather of Yoshio OISHI).
His mother was a daughter of Yoshikatsu OISHI (a great grandfather of Yoshio OISHI).
His mother was a daughter of Yoshikatsu OISHI (a great grandfather of Yoshio OISHI).

sen.j: 子がなく、一族の進藤長昌（輪王寺宮守澄法親王の家臣）の子進藤長之を養子に入れて後を継がせた。
sen.e: He didn't have any children, therefore, he adopted Nagayuki SHINDO, a son of the family member, Shindo Nagamasa (a vassal of Shucho Hosshinno (Cloistered Imperial Prince Shucho) in Rinojinomiya) and made him succeed to the Shindo family.

He did not have any children, therefore, he adopted Nagayuki SHINDO, a son of the family member, Nagamasa SHINDO (a vassal of Shucho Hosshinno [Cloistered Imperial Prince Shucho] in Rinojinomiya) and made him succeed to the Shindo family.
sen.cmt: didn'tはdid notとしました。進藤長昌は仕様にあわせて修正しました。括弧を修正しました。
sen.e: He did not have any children, therefore, he adopted Nagayuki SHINDO, a son of the family member, Nagamasa SHINDO (a vassal of Shucho Hosshinno [Cloistered Imperial Prince Shucho] in Rinojinomiya) and made him succeed to the Shindo family.
He died in 1718.
He died in 1718.
He died in 1718.
He died at the age of 77.
He died at the age of 77.
He died at the age of 77.
